name: Automater
description:
This plugins aims to offer a set of utilities that will extend Figma features.


Available Shortcuts

Currently, this is available only in MacOS:

  • Command Control Option C - Copy Selection
  • Command Control Option S - Swap Instances with Copied
  • Control Shift V - Paste in
  • Command Control Shift V - Paste in Place
  • Control . - Select Next Sibling
  • Control , - Select Previous Sibling


Known Issues

  • Plugin prevents people from launching the context menu or may produce white screens. This is not available for people who use Desktop client on M1 Macs.


Notes

  1. If you encounter any weird behaviour, remember that anything can be Undo. Also, please report the behaviour and I'll do my best to fix it.
  2. If you're using the Search menu, and you want to resize or align, I recommend to search directly for "Horizontally", "Left", "Center" to get fewer results.


To do:

  • Documentation
  • Fix bugs
  • Extend paste properties commands for all properties
  • Prototype commands
  • Fix Paste Interactions
